Montana Kamenga bụ onye mba Congo na-edekọ egwu, onye na-eti egwu, onye na-eti egwu na onye na-eme egwuregwu

N'otu oge, ọ bụ onye otu egwu Quartier Latin International, nke onye egwu Congo bụ Koffi Olomide guzobere ma duzie. Na mmepụta Inchallah, Kamenga bụ onye nke anọ na-abụ abụ ya, n'azụ Fally Ipupa, Bouro Mpela na Soleil Wanga, mana n'ihu Gibson Butukondolo na Deo Brando.
